how-to-make-flowchart_key3: We should create flowcharts on paper as it is very easy and simple. Creating flowcharts on your laptop or computer is a little bit difficult.
how-to-make-flowchart_key4: However if you need to submit your flowchart, it is recommended to use
how-to-make-flowchart_key6: to create flowcharts using your laptop or computer.
how-to-make-flowchart_key7: # How to create flowcharts using Draw.io?
how-to-make-flowchart_key10: , you will be asked to choose where you want to
how-to-make-flowchart_key12: so that you can download the
how-to-make-flowchart_key15: Enter the name of your flowchart.
how-to-make-flowchart_key16: On the left side, you will see a flowchart section where you can find all the flowchart components to create your diagram. You can connect these boxes using arrows.
how-to-make-flowchart_key17: Finally go to **`File`** menu to `save` the flowchart. When you `save` it, a **.xml** `file` will be downloaded that you can submit.
how-to-make-flowchart_key18: These flowchart `files` can be shared with one other. If you want to open an existing flowchart `file` from your computer, go to **`File` > Open From > Device** and select the `file` you wish to open.
how-to-make-flowchart_key19: *Note: In the upcoming questions, you will have to create and submit flowchart `files`. You don't need to worry about the colors used in the flowchart on draw.io. We have colored the flowchart in the examples only to make it easier for you to understand.*
